sources.title: N-term part
sources.description: ⚠️ Non-standard 3a (TGCT -Ala- instead of TTCT -Ser-). You can use the ATG from the fusion site as translation start. Omit STOP codon and make your protein in frame with the Ala for fusion.

sources.title: C-term part
sources.description: ⚠️ Non-standard 3b (TGCT -Ala- instead of TTCT -Ser-). Left Ala should be in frame with previous CDS. If possible omit STOP codon and make your protein in frame with the right Ser for fusion.

sources.title: C-term (extra)
sources.description: Left Ser should be in frame with previous CDS. Warning: You must include a STOP in your CDS!

description:
3xCDS fusion self-replicating plasmid

A plasmid with a yeast ORI with three CDS fused together
